about_the_game:
“Chronicles” are packs of themed levels with a self-contained story told throughout, and are unlocked after completing the first 6 levels of the main campaign.

After receiving a letter from an estranged family member, a rookie Leader will journey through the tricky swamps of the Outlands while tracking the steps of his ancestors.

“Home is where the heart is” is the fourth DLC for Outlanders, in which we follow the intertwined lives of four new characters exploring their own sense of belonging.

In addition to the 6-level campaign, this DLC contains new customization options for Sandbox mode.
